name: Synerlogic
tag_list: website-development, taxonomy, ontology, classification, cms, dotnetnuke, intranet, portal, extranet, content-management, records-management, drupal, sharepoint-2010, alfresco, dynamic-content-aggregation, records-compliance
overview:
SynerLogic specializes in designing and implementing intelligent, cost effective content management solutions for document & records management, intranets, websites and extranets/portals.

Synerlogic’s subject matter experts provide a full spectrum of CMS professional services including:

User Interface (UX / UE) Analysis & Design => Stakeholder workshops and focus groups => Surveys, questionnaires and social media feedback => User stories (Agile) Use Cases (UML) & Personas => Wireframes, storyboards and mock ups => Prototypes and pilot projects => Site Audits => Screen-to-screen flows, navigation maps & site maps => A/B, line-of-sight and motion (user) testing

Content Management: => Content inventory => Taxonomy, Ontology (Classification & Relatedness) => Content publishing file type & format optimization => records management best practices => Regulatory compliance and controls assessments => Dynamic Content Aggregation (like Amazon or Pandora)

Solution Design and Implementation => Focus on cost effectiveness and high efficiency => Packaged-based core components => Vendor partnerships (SharePoint 2010, Alfresco, Drupal, DotNetNuke, and RefineryCMS) => Strong bias towards no-code solution architecture => Hardware agnostic vision, cloud friendly => Systems integration => Requirements-centric => Technical, functional and non-functional specifications and tolerances

Consultants => Expert yet collaborative and very easy to work with => Onsite or remote using contemporary video conferencing => Highly cost effective
